data.comment: The match has started at Stade de la Mosson.
Reims's Boulaye Dia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Reims to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 4, In Montpellier Reims drive forward through Yunis Abdelhamid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Reims.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Reims have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 7, Vitorino Hilton (Montpellier) has been shown a straight red card by referee Willy Delajod.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Boulaye Dia.
In the minute 13, Goal! Boulaye Dia extends Reims's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Mathieu Cafaro.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Throw-in high up the field for Montpellier in Montpellier.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 20, Willy Delajod awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
Reims are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 24, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Reims's area.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 26, Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Reims needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Important block from the Montpellier defence as Nathanael Mbuku fires in a strike for Reims.
Corner awarded to Reims.
Boulaye Dia's header is off-target for Reims.
In the minute 30, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Reims take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Nathanael Mbuku.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Montpellier.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Reims.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Wout Faes (Reims) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Free kick Reims.
In the minute 42, Damien Le Tallec (Montpellier) has been sent off!
Reims's Mathieu Cafaro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montpellier defender.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 45, Reims have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Reims are coming forward and Valon Berisha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Stade de la Mosson the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
Willy Delajod has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Dimitry Bertaud is on a sub for Jonas Omlin for Montpellier.
Montpellier make their second substitution with Jordan Ferri replacing Joris Chotard.
Mathieu Cafaro for Reims gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Willy Delajod signals a Montpellier throw-in in Reims's half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Reims in the half of Montpellier.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Willy Delajod awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Reims pushes forward through Mathieu Cafaro, whose finish on goal is saved.
An attacking Reims player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 55, Ambroise Oyongo is booked for the home team.
Reims are going well in Montpellier. They now lead 0-4 thanks to a Boulaye Dia penalty.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Hugo Ekitike is replacing Boulaye Dia for the away team.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
The home team replace Florent Mollet with Keagan Dolly.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 61, Montpellier make their fourth substitution with Stephy Mavididi replacing Andy Delort.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 64, Montpellier's Arnaud Souquet is on target but unsuccessful.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Montpellier.
In the minute 70, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Hugo Ekitike gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 78, David Guion (Reims) is making a second substitution, with Moussa Doumbia replacing Mathieu Cafaro.
Fode Doucoure is replacing Thibault De Smet for Reims at Stade de la Mosson.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 80, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Yun Il-Lok is on a sub for Gaetan Laborde for Montpellier.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 81, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Reims.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
David Guion is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Moise Sakava replacing Valon Berisha.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Marshall Munetsi with Dario Maresic.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Yun Il-Lok (Montpellier) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 87, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Reims are caught offside.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Reims at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in high up the field for Reims in Montpellier.
The match has come to a close in Montpellier. The final score is 0-4.
